A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm seeing a lot of close-minded \"fans\" dumping on a film that took some very interesting (and entertaining) steps in what I feel is the right direction for Star Wars. Visually stunning and emotionally arresting. I unfortunately had certain events in the film spoiled for me\, but the movie still had me holding my breath. Honestly\, this is a serious contender for my favorite Star Wars film of all time. Ignore the fools who are upset by the changes. They've spent too long writing their own fanon.
